resources.string: Explore the early years of the God of Thunder in this brand-new adventure full of Marvel myth and magic! Join young Thor and his godly companions, Balder and Sif, as they travel the mystical land of Asgard on a quest of cosmic proportions. When Odin, the All-Father, sends his favorite son to gather four mystical elements that he will use to craft a powerful new weapon, not even Ragnarok will be able to stop the boy who would be king!
Stan Lee, Larry Lieber, Don Heck, Jack Kirby
Super-Genius Level Intellect, Powered Armor, Psychic Shield, Expert Engineer
